main event: Multiple sightings of a UFO at Rhein Main Air Base in Germany on different occasions.
interesting points: The initial sighting on August 4, 1951, involved a light that fell and transformed into a parachute before returning to a southerly course., The object was reported to be extremely fast, round, and white., The object was believed to emit no noise or exhaust during an earlier sighting on April 15, 1951., The observation on August 4 lasted for about 5 minutes., Both reports concluded there was insufficient data for a complete evaluation.
sighted object: unidentified aerial phenomenon, round or spherical object
witness description: pilot and several individuals in the vicinity
